alert.note: Alert for Custer; Kiowa; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:19PM CDT until August 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washita County in western Oklahoma... Western Custer County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 619 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Canute to 4 miles northwest of Sentinel to 4 miles west of Hobart, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, Hobart, Cordell, Burns Flat, Sentinel, Arapaho, Dill City, Canute, Lone Wolf, Custer City, Butler, Bessie, Rocky, Foss, Foss Reservoir, Cloud Chief, Retrop, and Stafford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
